        Init the scanner and returned the camera preview.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        returned the camera preview.

      • startScan

        public void startScan(int timeout,
             OnScanListener listener)
        Start scan
        Parameters:
        timeout - The timeout of scan unit: s
        listener - The callback of scan

      • stopScan

        public void stopScan()
        Stop scan

      • getScanLibVersion

        public java.lang.String getScanLibVersion()
        Get the version of scan library.

      • setConfiguration

        public void setConfiguration(android.os.Bundle config)
        To set configuration.

        Note: Set configuration when using scanner, called after initScanner(Context, Bundle) or initScanner(Bundle)

        Has Supported:
      • config.putBoolean(SCANNER_IS_TORCH_ON, true/false);
      • config.putBoolean(SCANNER_PLAY_BEEP, true/false);
      • config.putBoolean(SCANNER_CONTINUE_SCAN, true/false);
      • config.putBoolean(SCANNER_IS_BACK_CAMERA, true/false);
      • config.putInt(SCANNER_DECODE_MODE, example:DECODE_MODE_MIRROR);
      • config.putInt(SCANNER_RESOLUTION, example:Resolution_640x480);
Parameters:
config - The bundle config.

  • release

    public void release()
    Release the singleton.

  • setCodeTypeOn

    public void setCodeTypeOn(int codeType)
    To set code type works on.
    Parameters:
    codeType - The code type, refer to the define of Scanner.CodeType.

  • enableAllCodeType

    public void enableAllCodeType(boolean enable)
    To enable or disable the all code types
    Parameters:
    enable - true: enable all, false: disable all.
